subject: Genshin Impact EP - Lingering Aroma of the Solitary Butterfly
content:
The Wangsheng Funeral Parlor runs a special business, so it has always acted with great care, especially when it comes to rituals and ceremonies.

However, when the undertakers study the rules rigorously, the Director is often nowhere to be seen.

Where could this butterfly carrying a lingering aroma be found...

subject: Collected Miscellany - "Thoma: Crimson Armor of Loyalty" | Genshin Impact
content:
There are many things that Thoma will guard dearly, such as trusted friends, close colleagues, and those fluffy little creatures.

Oh, and the strong desire ignited in his heart to repay the kindness shown to him.

subject: "Shadow of the Ancients" Gameplay Details
content:
Katheryne of the Adventurers' Guild seems to be having trouble dealing with a certain investigative commission. Helping her might just come with its benefits...


〓Event Duration〓

Event Gameplay Period: 2021/11/05 10:00 – 2021/11/15 03:59 (Server Time)

"Autonomous Mechanical Energy Source: Conclusion" Quest Duration: 2021/11/15 04:00 – 2021/11/18 03:59 (Server Time)


〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 30 or above

And complete the Archon Quest: "A Flower Blooms in a Prison"


〓Notes〓

● After the event ends on 2021/11/15 at 03:59, Ayesha's Chaos Prospector will disappear.

● After the event ends on 2021/11/15 03:59, you will no longer be able to receive the event rewards. Please claim your rewards in time.


〓Gameplay Summary〓

The "Shadow of the Ancients" event is split into 3 phases: Phase 1, Phase 2, and the Final Phase. Travelers are required to complete these different challenge quests. Each phase will gradually open as the event progresses.


〓Event Details〓

Next, let's take a look at the detailed descriptions of each of the event's phases~

subject: Version 2.3 Special Program Preview
content:
Dear Travelers,


It's announcement time! The special program for Genshin Impact's new version will premiere on the official Twitch channel on 12/11/2021 at 07:00 AM (UTC-5)!

>>>https://www.twitch.tv/genshinimpactofficial


Travelers will also be able to view the premiere on our official TikTok channel at the same time.

>>>https://www.tiktok.com/@genshinimpact_en


This special program will feature juicy details about new game content and developments in Version 2.3. It will also "drop" some redemption codes and other goodies!


The special program will also be broadcast on the official YouTube channel on 12/11/2021 at 11:00 AM (UTC-5)

>>>https://www.youtube.com/c/GenshinImpact


Make sure to follow us, Travelers. We'll see you there!

subject: "Dreams of Bloom" Gameplay Details
content:
The Inazuman florist Sakuya wants to promote her shop, "Sakuya's Flowers," so she is organizing a new promotional activity...


​



〓Event Duration〓

Seed Exchange Duration: 2021/11/12 10:00 – 2021/11/18 03:59 (Server Time)

Flower Exchange Duration: 2021/11/12 10:00 – 2021/11/22 03:59 (Server Time)


〓Eligibility〓

Unlock the Serenitea Pot and complete the Archon Quest "Ritou Escape Plan"

subject: Genshin Impact ｜ Paimon's Paintings X Emojis Now Available!
content:
Greetings, Travelers! The latest emojis from Genshin Impact are now available~


Paimon's Paintings include a collection of chibi emojis of various Genshin Impact characters. We hope you like them! Paimon will continue to paint more cute emojis for everyone~

subject: Version 2.3 "Shadows Amidst Snowstorms" Trailer | Genshin Impact
content:
The biting cold of the frozen land causes many to falter, but the secrets of life slowly grow within...

Follow the shadows that lurk in the snow, and wait for the ashes to sweep away and the dust to settle.


Just for the record, the above has absolutely nothing to do with the founder and leader of the Arataki Gang: Arataki Itto.

subject: "Ley Line Overflow" Event - Double Drops From Blossoms of Wealth and Blossoms of Revelation!
content:
Successfully complete Blossom of Wealth or Blossom of Revelation challenges during this event to obtain double the rewards.

〓Event Duration〓

2021/11/15 04:00:00 ~ 2021/11/22 03:59:59

〓Eligibility〓

Revitalize a Blossom of Wealth or a Blossom of Revelation

〓Event Details〓

● During the event, Travelers who successfully challenge a Blossom of Wealth or Blossom of Revelation and who consume Original Resin to obtain rewards will receive double the output. A total of 3 such bonuses will be available each day!

subject: Dear Travelers, the limited-time event "Adventurers' Guild on Twitch" is about to begin~
content:
Dear Travelers, Genshin Impact is joining Twitch to bring you the“Adventurers’ Guild on Twitch” event! Come join us on Twitch to start a new adventure!


Support your favorite streamer to receive an event-exclusive wind glider: Wings of Feasting!


Event Duration

November 25, 1:00 – December 8, 23:59 (UTC+8)


How to Participate

1. All Travelers need to log into their Twitch account during the event

2. Go to a channel that is participating in the event (the list of participating streamers will be updated in this post on November 24)

3. Travelers can obtain in-game items, including the exclusive Wings of Feasting wind glider, by supporting participating Twitch creators during the event. By purchasing two months of eligible Tier 1 subscriptions to select Twitch channels*, travelers will receive a reward redemption code for the Wings of Feasting wind glider, 30,000 Mora, Jade Parcels, 2 Tonkotsu Ramen, and 2 Sautéed Matsutake.*See list of participating creators and additional qualifying actions in the FAQs below

**Only Travelers who have reached Adventure Rank 10 or above can use the redemption code



Notes

1.Users must purchase a new sub or gift a subscription during the campaign period, and only while the broadcaster is actively live streaming ‘Genshin Impact’ category with the  ‘Wings of Feasting’ tag.

2. Each Twitch user can only get one redemption code, and each Genshin Impact account can only use one redemption code. Accounts that have already used the redemption code will not be able to redeem it again.

3. Please do not lose the redemption code, the redemption code will not be reissued~

4.Only Travelers who have reached Adventure Rank 10 or above can use the redemption code~

5. The redemption code is valid within one week after the event ends (until December 15, 23:59 UTC+8), please redeem it in time~

6. Anonymous gift subscriptions and recurring subscriptions will not be counted in this event.

7. During the event, you can also get a redemption code by making a total of two new Tier 1 subscriptions (or gift subscriptions) on two channels.

8. Subscriptions made before the event are considered invalid. Please subscribe during the event duration~

9. Subscriptions obtained through Amazon Prime and existing recurring subscriptions will not count in this event.

Bundle Contents

Wings of Feasting ×1, Mora ×30,000, Jade Parcels ×1, Tonkotsu Ramen ×2, Sautéed Matsutake ×2



List of Participating Channels

Travelers can also view the participating channels that are broadcasting live by clicking here.

How to Use the Redemption Code

Travelers can click Settings → Account → Redeem Code in the game, and use the redemption code~



Or Travelers can refer to the official website:

https://genshin.mihoyo.com/en/gift


FAQ


!! I am already a subscriber to a participating channel. Does that count for the campaign?

No.Users must purchase a new sub or gift a subscription during the campaign period, and only while the broadcaster is actively live streaming ‘Genshin Impact’ category with the  ‘Wings of Feasting’ tag. If the broadcaster is streaming a different title during this campaign, users will not earn progress towards the reward items.


If I don't have a Genshin Impact account, can I still earn the in-game rewards?

Any Traveler with a Twitch account can participate in the event to get the "Wings of Feasting" redemption code.

However, the redemption code can only be redeemed on the Genshin Impact game account.


What types of subscriptions will be counted in this event?

All eligible channel subscriptions will be counted into this event, including regular subscriptions, multi-month subscriptions and gift subscriptions.

However, automatic recurring subscriptions and anonymous gift subscriptions are not included.

After completing Tier 1 subscription for two months, Tier 2 subscription for one month, or Tier 3 subscription for one month, you can get an event redemption code.

The event redemption code can be obtained for the following valid subscription conditions:

Two Tier 1 gift subs

One Tier 2 gift sub

One Tier 3 gift sub

Two Tier 1 subs

One Tier 2 sub

One Tier 3 sub

One Tier 1 gift sub AND one Tier 1 sub

Detailed information about gift subscriptions, including the process and pricing, can be found here:https://help.twitch.tv/s/article/gift-subscriptions


How can I check which channels are participating in the event? Also, how can I confirm that I purchased a gift subscription or subscription during the right time?

Travelers can refer to the list of participating channels (will be updated in this post on November 24) and the event duration.

If a participating channel is broadcasting "Genshin Impact" with the label "Wings of Feasting" (shown under their profile picture), and it is during the event, then you can get event rewards.


If I received a redemption code, where can I find the redemption code?

As long as you obtained the redemption code, the redemption code will be sent to your Twitch notifications inbox.

The redemption code will remain in the notifications inbox and can be viewed at any time, until you delete the information.

Please note that the redemption code has an expiration date as described in the above mentioned event rules.


Can I use an anonymous gift subscription?

No, you cannot participate in this event with an anonymous gift subscription.


Can I give away more than two subscriptions to get additional redemption codes?

Each Twitch account can only get one redemption code for the event rewards.


I already own the event reward items, can I still participate in the Twitch event to get the redemption code?

Each Twitch user can only get one redemption code, and each Genshin Impact account can only use one redemption code.

Accounts that have already used the redemption code will not be able to redeem again.


In which regions can the redemption code be used?

The redemption code for this event can be used in the Asia, Europe, North America, and TW/HK/MO servers.


Are there any ways I can subscribe that don’t count for this campaign?

Yes. Anonymous gift subscriptions, Prime Subs, and existing recurring subscriptions are not eligible for this campaign. If you were previously gifted a subscription to a channel participating in this campaign, continuing that subscription is also not eligible for this campaign.


Do I need to use a specific device to purchase eligible subscriptions or receive my reward redemption code?

You can use a desktop Web browser or either of the Twitch mobile apps to purchase subscriptions and receive your reward redemption code.If you are viewing on a console, you’ll need to make your purchase from either a mobile device or a web browser.


I am having trouble redeeming my reward redemption code, who do I contact?

Please contact：genshin_cs@mihoyo.com if you run into any issues with the reward redemption code itself.


Is this the only time this in-game reward will be available?

It may be possible to obtain items from this reward redemption code by other means in the future.


Do I need a minimum Adventure Rank level to be able to use the redemption code?

Only travlers who have reached Adventure Rank 10 or above can use the redemption code.


I met the eligibility requirements but did not receive any codes. Who can I contact?

The redemption code will be sent to your Twitch mailbox within 24 hours. If you haven't received a redemption code after more than 24 hours, please contact Twitch customer service for further consultation:


Is there a way I can check how many eligible subscriptions I have made during the event?

Although there is no specific location that can be used to check event progress, Travelers can refer to the Twitch payment history section in their profile to view recent purchases/gift subscriptions.Note that this should simply be used as a reference and does not guarantee the purchases qualified for the campaign.



Terms apply. Applicable to purchase of 2 new tier 1 subs or non-anonymous gift subs, or 1 new tier 2 or 3 subs or 

nonanonymous gift subs, on eligible channels streaming ‘Genshin Impact’ category with ‘Wings of Feasting’ tag. Anonymous gift subs, Prime subs, and existing recurring subs ineligible. Not available in China. Offer available Nov. 24, 2021 at 9 AM PT to Dec. 8, 2021 at 07:59 AM PT. Codes expire Dec. 15, 2021 at 07:59 AM PT, and redeemable upon achieving Rank 10 in game.

subject: Version 2.3 "Shadows Amidst Snowstorms" New Equipment Overview Part I
content:
Hello Travelers~! Today, Paimon wants to introduce you to the brand-new equipment that will be appearing in Version 2.3 events! Come on, let's take a look~

(Examples of the following weapon based on Level 90 and Refinement Rank 1)

subject: Event Wish "Secretum Secretorum" - Boosted Drop Rate for "Kreideprinz" Albedo (Geo)!
content:
Travelers, stock up on weapons and characters in the event wish to make your party stronger in combat!


〓Event Wish Duration〓

After the Version 2.3 update–2021/12/14 17:59:00



〓Event Wish Details〓

● During this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character "Kreideprinz" Albedo (Geo) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!


● During this event wish, the 4-star characters "Trial by Fire" Bennett (Pyro), "Chivalric Blossom" Noelle (Geo), and "Thorny Benevolence" Rosaria (Cryo) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!


※ Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "Wanderlust Invocation."


※ This is for "Character Event Wish". The wish guarantee count for "Character Event Wish" and "Character Event Wish-2" is shared, and is accumulated between both "Character Event Wish" and "Character Event Wish-2". This wish guarantee count is independent of the guarantee counts of other types of wishes.


※ The "Test Run" trial event will be open during this event wish. Travelers may use fixed lineups containing the selected trial characters to enter specific stages and test them out. Travelers that complete the challenges will receive the corresponding rewards!


※ For more information, go to the Wish screen and select Details in the bottom-left corner.

● During the event, the event-exclusive 5-star weapons Freedom-Sworn (Sword) and Song of Broken Pines (Claymore) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

● During the event, the event-exclusive 4-star weapons Wine and Song (Catalyst) and Alley Hunter (Bow) as well as the 4-star weapons Lion's Roar (Sword), Sacrificial Greatsword (Claymore), and Dragon's Bane (Polearm) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

subject: "Hangout Events: Series IV" - Story Quest Overview
content:
Travelers who reach the required Adventure Rank and complete the prerequisite quests will be able to use Story Keys to unlock the respective Hangout Events for Beidou and Gorou.


The Hangout Events feature unlocks at Adventure Rank 26. Story Keys are obtained by completing Daily Commissions (one Story Key is awarded for every eight commissions completed.)

 

〓Quest Start Time〓

Permanently available after the Version 2.3 update

 

〓Series IV Unlock Criteria〓

Hangout Event: Beidou - Act I

Adventure Rank 30 or above

Complete the Archon Quest "Chapter II: Act III - Omnipresence Over Mortals"  

 

Hangout Event: Gorou- Act I

Adventure Rank 40 or above

Complete the Archon Quest "Chapter II: Act III - Omnipresence Over Mortals"

And complete Dracaena Somnolenta Chapter: Act I - "Warriors' Dreams Like Spring Grass Renewing"

subject: Paimon's Sneak Peek at Version 2.3 "Shadows Amidst Snowstorms" New Events - Phase I
content:
Hello, Travelers~ Version 2.3 is just around the corner. Let's sneak a peek at the information for the new events~


​


​


​


​


​


​


​


​

subject: The mortal realm briefly gracing, like a wisp of smoke vanishing
content:
"One has traversed many realms and taken a great many pupils. Among them, Shenhe bears the closest resemblance to oneself. Were she not a mortal, one would like to have her stay by my side." — Cloud Retainer


Shenhe

Lonesome Transcendence

Ethereal Soul Amidst the Mortal Realm

Cryo

Crista Doloris



Shenhe comes from a branch family of a clan of exorcists. Due to certain reasons, Cloud Retainer took her in as a disciple.


To Shenhe, Cloud Retainer is a knowledgeable and chatty master.


To Cloud Retainer, Shenhe stands out as special from amongst the mortals she has instructed.


Living with adepti as a human is by no means an easy task, but Shenhe has a unique constitution, an immensely strong will, and a great talent for adepti arts, all of which have won her the acknowledgment of the adepti. However, the long years of cultivation, coupled with the habit of eating divine herbs and drinking the dew of the mountains, have made her more and more distant from earthly life, and she has even been regarded as a mysterious white-haired adeptus.


The occasional sharpness in her personality and the red ropes adorning her body add to her "mystery". If her past were to be written as a story, there would be multiple versions for sure.


Be it an immortal or a white-haired witch, how will people view this mysterious lady? Her secrets and feelings are as difficult to capture as the drifting clouds in the mountains.

subject: The opera star's performance is a genteel display of melodious harmony.
content:
"One performance by Yun Jin at our tea house rakes in enough Mora that we won't have to open for a whole month!" — Fan Er'ye of Heyu Tea House


Yun Jin

Stage Lucida

Current Director of Yun-Han Opera Troupe

Geo

Opera Grandis



She is the director of the Yun-Han Opera Troupe and is also a famous figure in Liyue Harbor's opera scene.


Yun Jin is known for her sweet singing voice and intricate costumes, as well as her animated and dynamic performances. Whether it's a delicate and dignified young lady or a mighty and honorable heroine, she can play any role.


What's even rarer is that this young actress is also a playwright. Other than "The Divine Damsel of Devastation", the Yun-Han Opera Troupe has performed many other new plays in recent years, all of which were written by Yun Jin.


However, what is surprising is that Yun Jin, who has always displayed a dignified and elegant image, has a little hobby that is not known to the public — she likes listening to rock 'n' roll.


If you see Yun Jin at a rock 'n' roll performance in Liyue Harbor, please refrain from telling the whole world about it.


Otherwise, she might get nagged by the elders again.

subject: "Shadows Amidst Snowstorms" Event: Take part and obtain the event-exclusive weapon, Cinnabar Spindle (Sword)
content:
During the "Shadows Amidst Snowstorms" event, take part in "Born of the Snow" gameplay and complete various challenges in the Dragonspine area to obtain Cinnabar Spindle (Sword). Collect Snowstrider Emblems and Mysterious Emblems to exchange for rewards such as event-exclusive Weapon Refinement Materials, Crown of Insight, Weapon Ascension Materials, Talent Level-Up Materials, Hero's Wit, Mora, and Mystic Enhancement Ore from the Event Shop.


〓Event Duration〓

​


〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 20 or above and complete the Archon Quest "For a Tomorrow Without Tears"

Complete Princeps Cretaceus Chapter: Act I - "Traveler Observation Report" and Joel's "Lost in the Snow" quest

*During the event, the Adventure Rank required to accept Albedo's Story Quest "Traveler Observation Report" will be adjusted to 20. Story Keys will not be required to unlock it.


〓Born of the Snow〓

● During the event, complete "Shadows Amidst Snowstorms" Act I: The Snowy Past to unlock "Born of the Snow."

● During the event, you can obtain various Snowman Components during the Dragonspine Special Training to make Puffy Snowmen in the camp. You can also exchange these components with your friends through the event page.

● Once you have completed several Puffy Snowmen, you will obtain Cinnabar Spindle (Sword), Snowman Torso, Primogems, Mora and other rewards.

● During and after the event, you can bring Snowman Torsos and Snowman Components that you have obtained into your Serenitea Pot, and continue to make Puffy Snowmen there.


〓Dragonspine Special Training: Agility Training〓

● During the event, complete "Shadows Amidst Snowstorms" Act I: The Snowy Past to unlock the first Agility Training race track.

● During the event, Travelers may challenge four race tracks in total, with a new race track unlocking every three days after the beginning of the event.

● After arriving at the designated location and beginning the race track training, Travelers should follow the guides to proceed down a race course and collect Insignias of Adventure and Insignias of Conquest. Blessings appearing on the track will enhance the character's abilities and help Travelers complete their training even faster.

● Complete "Agility Training" for a chance to obtain Snowstrider Emblems, Primogems, Mora, Mystic Enhancement Ore, and other rewards. Snowstrider Emblems can be exchanged for rewards in the event shop.


〓Dragonspine Special Training:·Tracker Training〓

● During the event, complete "Shadows Amidst Snowstorms" Act I: The Snowy Past to unlock the first two Tracker Training challenges, the second of which will unlock after the first one is completed.

● During the event, Travelers may attempt a total of eight training challenges, with two new training challenges unlocking every three days after the beginning of the event.

● Travelers need to find and melt all the Ice Crystal Piles in the training area to complete this Tracker Training. After melting the Ice Crystal Piles, they might find the Snowman Components that they can use to make Puffy Snowmen.

● Complete "Tracker Training" for a chance to obtain Snowman Heads, Snowstrider Emblems, Primogems, Mora, Mystic Enhancement Ore and other rewards. Snowstrider Emblems can be exchanged for rewards in the event shop.


〓Dragonspine Special Training:·Combat Training〓

● During the event, complete "Shadows Amidst Snowstorms" Act I: The Snowy Past to unlock the first two Combat Training challenges, the second of which will unlock after the first one is completed.

● During the event, Travelers may attempt a total of eight training challenges, with two new training challenges unlocking every three days after the beginning of the event.

● When the Traveler reaches the training area, they can find and bring Scarlet Quartz and attack three nearby mechanisms to activate them, which will change the Lure's state from "Source Cold" to "Heat Source" mode. Activate the Lure and defeat all the opponents attracted to it to complete the training.

● Complete "Combat Training" for a chance to obtain Snowman Heads, Snowstrider Emblems, Primogems, Mora, Mystic Enhancement Ore, and other rewards. Snowstrider Emblems can be exchanged for rewards in the event shop.


〓Mysterious Challenge〓

● During the event, complete "Shadows Amidst Snowstorms" Act II: The Shadows Deepen to unlock Dragonspine's Mysterious Opponent challenge.

● Dragonspine's Mysterious Opponent contains a kind of Foreign Substance. If you can snatch these Foreign Substances, perhaps it might be easier to defeat this opponent.

● Complete the Dragonspine's Mysterious Opponent challenge quest to obtain Mysterious Emblems, Hero's Wit, Mora, and other rewards. Mysterious Emblems can be exchanged for rewards in the event shop.

subject: Eula Chibi Stickers: New stickers available now! Help yourselves, Travelers!
content:
Eula Chibi Stickers: New stickers available now! Help yourselves, Travelers!



Eula - Let's Get Going

"Ready for reconnaissance."




Eula - Snowfall

"I'm into all sorts of cool things."




Eula - Vantage Point

"Visibility is excellent! If we head to higher ground, we can do a full recon of enemy activity in the area."



"Visibility is excellent! If we head to higher ground, we can do a full recon of enemy activity in the area."


In addition, the Event Wish "Born of Ocean Swell" will be available after the Version 2.3 update.


The event-exclusive 5-star character "Dance of the Shimmering Wave" Eula (Cryo) will receive a huge drop-rate boost! Don't miss out~

subject: "Shadows Amidst Snowstorms" Gameplay Details
content:
The "Shadows Amidst Snowstorms" event is about to begin!

Paimon has an odd thought and drags you off to the Mondstadt alchemy shop to seek answers...


New missions have also been added to Shadowed Snowfall. Complete them to receive BEP.


〓Event Duration〓

Gameplay Duration：2021/11/25 10:00 – 2021/12/13 03:59

Event Shop Duration: 2021/11/25 10:00 – 2021/12/20 03:59


〓Eligibility〓

Reach Adventure Rank 20 or above, and complete the Archon Quest "For a Tomorrow Without Tears"

Complete Albedo's Story Quest "Traveler Observation Report" and Joel's "Lost in the Snow" Quest

*During the event, the Adventure Rank required to accept Albedo's Story Quest "Traveler Observation Report" will be adjusted to 20. Story Keys will not be required to unlock it.


〓Gameplay Summary〓

​


〓Gameplay Overview〓

​


​


​


​


​


〓Event Shop〓

subject: Genshin Impact EP - A Canvas of Soft Snow on Icy Peaks
content:
A blizzard races over the mountain, concealing an enigmatic past.

Memories are engraved on the earth, which give rise to nature's treasures.

Everything comes to life with a light stroke of the brush.

subject: Genshin Impact EP - Gentle Waves of Frost
content:
Windswept cliffs, secluded forests, and snow at the foot of a mountain.

Across the outskirts of Mondstadt lie the scattered footprints of the Spindrift Knight.

But under the day's warm breeze, the dutiful Captain of the Reconnaisance Company would occasionally have a rest.

subject: Genshin Impact ｜ Paimon's Paintings VIII Emojis Now Available!
content:
Greetings, Travelers! The latest emojis from Genshin Impact are now available~


Paimon's Paintings include a collection of chibi emojis of various Genshin Impact characters. We hope you like them! Paimon will continue to paint more cute emojis for everyone~
